overview: Rhonda is a beautiful and sophisticated woman with a brain that knows how to get what she wants. When she decides to marry she tells her fiance she is a virgin, dedicated to preserving her sacred virginity for the day they wed. In addition to being beautiful and sophisticated, Rhonda is a liar who never turns anybody down.
tagline: Can A Nympho Live Happily Ever After?
title: Here Comes the Bride
